change.changenote: Section 1 (1), (3) and (4) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Cariboo Forest Region is established, having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Forests_Cariboo_2014.pdf.
The Cariboo Land Recording District is constituted, having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Lands_Cariboo_2014.pdf.
The Cariboo Range District has the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Range_Cariboo_2014.pdf.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1), (3) and (4) BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Kootenay Boundary Forest Region is established, having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Forests_Kootenay%20Boundary_2014.pdf.

ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Lands_Kootenay%20Boundary_2014.pdf.
The Kootenay Boundary Range District has the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Range_Kootenay%20Boundary_2014.pdf.

change.changenote: Section 3 (1), (3) and (4) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Northeast Forest Region is established, having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) and (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 124/2018, effective June 25, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Omineca Forest Region is established, having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Forests_Omineca_2014.pdf.
The following forest districts are established, having the boundaries shown on the map referred to in subsection (1):

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the Fort St. James Forest District;

change.changenote: Section 4 (1), (3) and (4) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Omineca Forest Region is continued, having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Forests_Omineca_20180625.pdf.

ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Lands_Omineca_2014.pdf.
The Omineca Range District has the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Boundaries_Pub_Range_Omineca_2014.pdf.

change.changenote: Section 5 (2) (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 124/2018, effective June 25, 2018.
Section 5 (1), (3) and (4) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

change.changenote: Section 9 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 45 (1) (b) (ii) of the Forest Act and section 2.1 (2) (a) and (4) of the Forest and Range Practices Act, Coast Forest Region means the area having the boundaries shown on the map published on the following website:
ftp://ftp.luco.gov.bc.ca/outgoing/FLNRO_Admin_Bdry/FLNRO_Coast_old_boundaries_pub_2014.pdf.

change.changenote: Section 10 was enacted by BC Reg 152/2020, effective June 26, 2020.
